request.description: This API is used to register a new user after passing validation checks. Proper Validation checks for username and password is implemented - Username must not be null value or less than 3 characters and should only contain alphabets. Password must be more than 8 characters. Email also must be valid.

response.name: Invalid Response

request.description: This API authenticates the user and generates token if credentials are valid.

response.name: Invalid Response

request.description: This API is used to create a blog post. Blogs can be only created after providing authentication credentials (token) and after passing validations.

This API is used to retrieve all blog posts using pagination. To switch between page use the below query parameter within this API.

`http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/blogs/?page=page_no`

response.name: Valid Response

request.description: This API is used to retrieve a blog based on a valid blog id. If invalid blog id is provided error message will be shown.
This API is used to update a particular blog using valid blog id and valid inputs. Also the blog will be only updated if its user is same as authenticated user, otherwise error message will be shown.
This API is used to delete blogs using valid blog id given and if the authenticated user is the blog owner, otherwise invalid error message will be shown.
This API is used to add comment under a blog using specified valid blog id after authentication and validating input. If invalid blog id is given error message will be shown.
This API is used to get all comments under the specified blog. If specified blog id is invalid error message will be shown.

response.name: Valid Response

request.description: This API is used to update comments after passing validation and authentication tests. Only the orginal user who made the comment can update it, otherwise error message will be shown.
This API is used to delete comments under a blog after passing validation and authentication tests. Only the orginal user who made the comment can delete it, otherwise error message will be shown.
